CustomField.description:
Contains the replacement key to the settings for CG Cloud Synchronization namepsace SOQL macro.
Example: If this method returns the string: MY_NAMESPACE, then every SOQL query executed by the system will be replaced like this:
SELECT $MY_NAMESPACE.MyCustomField__c FROM $MY_NAMESPACE.MyCustomObject__c replaced with SELECT cgcloud__.MyCustomField__c FROM cgcloud__.MyCustomObject__c where the string cgcloud__ is the prefix obtained from {@link SYNCConstants.NAMESPACEPREFIX}.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Contains the replacement key (or anchor) of the Settings for the namespace macro.
For example if this method returns the String "MY_NAMESPACE" then every SOQL query executed by the system will be replaced the following way:
SELECT $MY_NAMESPACE.MyCustomField__c FROM $MY_NAMESPACE.MyCustomObject__c with something like this: SELECT [NS]__.MyCustomField__c FROM [NS]__.MyCustomObject__c
CustomField.label: Namespace Macro
